name: Gloryhope Ventures
overview: Gloryhope Ventures is a startup fund associated with Go & Company, a boutique investment bank with a strong presence and proven track record in Greater China. Our team locates strong prospects in the consumer market, creative, and digital commerce industries and makes first round investments of 100,000 USD to 500,000 USD to jumpstart their entrepreneurial dreams. We operate on a services oriented philosophy that guides us to not only provide seed money for our companies, but also to offer a comprehensive package of services to secure growth based on our strong business network and capital markets expertise in the region.
